values.description:
Mead Structures Ltd are a Consulting Civil and Structural Engineer based in Sussex near Brighton and Worthing. Offering Structural Engineering services throughout Southern England, London and beyond, our friendly Engineers have a client focused approach to Structural Engineering that puts service before fees.

Working closely with our Clients, Architects and Contractors, we pride ourselves in providing a fast, reliable, cost-effective Structural Engineering service tailored to suit their specific needs. Residential, commercial or industrial, minor works or larger development, we have the expertise to meet your Structural Engineering requirements.

Our experience covers a wide variety of Civil and Structural Engineering disciplines, from renovation and refurbishment projects to new build schemes in a variety of market sectors. Using their specialist local and historical knowledge our skilled Engineers also undertake detailed Structural Inspections and prepare Structural Engineers Reports on specific defects for valuation and remedial purposes.

For an informal discussion with one of our Structural Engineers, please do not hesitate to contact us.
values.name: Mead Structures Ltd

values.description: CHP specialises in press photography, PR photography and commercial photography across the UK. With bases in London, Brighton and the North of England, Chris is able to offer his services to corporate, media and PR clients throughout the country.
values.name: Chris Hutty Photography

values.description: Founded in 1971, Valley Bank & Trust is a Colorado family owned community bank based in Brighton. We currently have 10 locations that span the northern Front Range. It is our mission to be the premier provider of not only financial products, but also the highest levels of customer service and business leadership in the communities we serve.
values.name: Valley Bank & Trust

values.description: Established for over 147 years, Off Licence News is the voice of drinks retailing. Editor Rosie Davenport has been writing about the drinks industry for more than ten years. Before editing OLN, she was features and brands editor of sister on-trade magazine Morning Advertiser. Deputy editor Christine Boggis started her career at the Eastbourne Herald and has since worked for international newswire AFP and legal magazine In Brief. She has completed her WSET Diploma, and speaks fluent German and French. Features editor Nicola Collenette began her career at the Evening Argus in Brighton and has since written for travel magazines and been news editor for on-trade title The Publican. She joined OLN in October 2008 after living and working in Japan for two years, and now handles features, supplements and beer and cider news.
values.name: Off Licence News

values.description:
BBP Consulting Engineers Ltd, specialises in Civil, Structural and Municipal Engineering.  The Company was originally established in 1986 as a Partnership and has been engaged in a wide range of projects, from inception to completion,from its Brighton Office, for Clients across the UK and overseas.

Details of the range of the Company’s services and expertise, together with information concerning projects and Clients both past and current, can be found in the Company's current web site.

We believe in the application of experience and judgment to Engineering design as well as to calculation and analysis.

This philosophy is generally achieved by employment of competent and committed Engineers and Designers, Technical and support staff, and by the creating of a working environment in which innovative design can flourish.
values.name: BBP Consulting Engineers Ltd

TackTracker
values.description: TackTracker is well recognised as being the world's best yacht tracking and analysis system.  After a year of development and testing in 2008 it gained this reputation at the 2009 Etchells Worlds held at Royal Brighton Yacht Club, Melbourne, Australia and has managed to consolidate its performance by simply responding rapidly to further suggested enhancements from the world's leading sailors including gold medallists and world champions. If you're a club sailor, just beginning, Olympic sailor or a club coach you will benefit enormously from using TackTracker.  Feel free to look: www.tacktracker.com    Trial TackTracker for free for two weeks using a GPS or your iPhone!
